thread.title: PlayStation Blogcast 240: GDC Ya Later
thread.title_full: PlayStation Blogcast 240: GDC Ya Later – PlayStation.Blog

author: Justin Massongill
title: PlayStation Blogcast 240: GDC Ya Later
text:
Subscribe via iTunes , Google or RSS , or download here 
On this week’s Blogcast, Sid and I recount our favorite stories to come out of GDC ’17. We also ponder the finer points of the “clicker” genre, look forward to the sleeper hit-to-be Disc Jam, and share stories of our adventures in Guerrilla’s Horizon Zero Dawn. Finally, a thought-provoking listener letter kicks off a discussion about overhyping games and expectation management. Enjoy the show!
Stuff We Talked About The biggest news from GDC Horizon Zero Dawn Ghost Recon Wildlands Nier Automata Loot Rascals Disc Jam Clicker Heroes Hype trains and the managing of expectations Recent Episodes 239: Bring Me That Horizon 238: Take Me Out to the Ball Game 237: Andromonauts
